message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I've sold 0 products so far, and I'm confident that this one is a great opportunity. Thank you for the offer and the guarantee. I appreciate the free inspection by a third-party expert. I believe this is a good opportunity and I would like to proceed with the purchase.
